data.name: PAYDAY 2: The OVERKILL B-Sides Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
PAYDAY 2: The OVERKILL B-Sides Soundtrack is the 22nd DLC pack and the third soundtrack for PAYDAY 2. It includes an eclectic collection of tracks composed for trailers, teasers, short movies and websites. Written and produced by OVERKILL's celebrated composer Simon Viklund, the OVERKILL B-Sides album ranges from British punk to the Wild West by way of traditional Croatian folk. As PAYDAY 2 grows, the soundtrack grows with it, and new tracks are added for free. Additional music can be downloaded for free at our official Bandcamp website here.

Track List

  • 1. Enter The Hallway (from the Hoxton Breakout short film) 00:48
  • 2. SWAT Attack (from the Hoxton Breakout short film) 01:39
  • 3. Showdown (from the Hoxton Breakout short film) 01:10
  • 4. Double MLGs (from the Hoxton Breakout short film) 00:26
  • 5. Rule Britannia (from the Hoxton Breakout short film) 00:13
  • 6. Hur Jag Trivs (from the John Wick short film) 01:01
  • 7. An Unexpected Call (from the John Wick short film) 02:06
  • 8. This Is Goodbye (from the John Wick short film) 02:20
  • 9. I Will Give You My All (ringtone) 00:30
  • 10. Zagrebacka (from The Butcher short film) 01:15
  • 11. Meat And Machine Guns (from The Butcher short film) 02:21
  • 12. The Enforcer (from the OVERKILL Pack trailer) 01:16
  • 13. Infamy 2.0 (from the Infamy 2.0 website) 01:19
  • 14. Collide (from the Animation Update website) 01:50
  • 15. Shootout (from the Western Pack trailer) 02:07
  • 16. Pilgrim (from the Western Pack website) 01:42

• Please note – The PAYDAY 2: B-Sides Soundtrack will be placed in your PAYDAY 2 folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\PAYDAY2\PAYDAY 2 B-Sides Soundtrack

Credits

  • Vocals on track 6 by Sofia Alm
  • Mandolin, acoustic guitar and additional vocals on track 10 by Johannes Runemark
  • All other live instruments and vocals by Simon Viklund
  • All tracks written, produced, mixed and mastered by Simon Viklund

Bonus Content

• New music added for free on Steam and Bandcamp – PAYDAY 2: The B-Sides Soundtrack is initially a collection of 16 tracks. As PAYDAY 2 grows, the soundtrack will grow with it and new tracks will be added for free to everyone who owns the soundtrack.

data.short_description: PAYDAY 2: The OVERKILL B-Sides Soundtrack is the 22nd DLC pack and the third soundtrack for PAYDAY 2. It includes an eclectic collection of tracks composed for trailers, teasers, short movies and websites.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP SP3
  • Processor:2 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA GeForce 8800/ATI Radeon HD 2600 (256MB minimum)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:13 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows XP SP3/Vista/Windows 7
  • Processor:2.3 GHz Intel Quad Core Processor
  • Memory:3 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA GeForce GTX460/ATI Radeon HD 5850 (512MB minimum)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:13 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible

data.legal_notice: PAYDAY 2 is a trademark of Starbreeze AB. All other trademarks are properties of their respective owners. Developed by OVERKILL - a Starbreeze Studio and published by 505 Games. All rights reserved.
